root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 6-1-4, translated into en
root.data: Objective 6. Guarantee access for all to sustainably managed water supply and sanitation services6.1 By 2030, ensure universal and equitable access to drinking water at an affordable cost6.1.4. Number of water and sanitation infrastructuresIt is the count of all the water and sanitation infrastructuresSum of all water and sanitation infrastructureNot available
